description: Ashton Bradley decides to celebrate his favourite holiday in the best way he knows how. Fireworks' Picnic' BBQ' No, he is of course abusing the fresh faced Kalvin Ash. Ashton finds this adorable young straight boy tied in the mill. Ashton covers Kalvin's body in hot, white wax before adding red and blue to make his very own flag on the boy. And what better way to finish it off then by signing his piece of art with his own sticky, hot, cum.
title: Ashton Bradley & Kalvin Ash
